item.title: Fifa accuses Malaysia of faking foreign-born players' eligibility
item.description: The alleged forgery was done to comply with Fifa's 'grandfather rule' for foreign-born players.

item.title: Army general named as Madagascar PM to quell Gen Z protests
item.description: Protesters have rejected the appointment and have demanded the president steps down within 48 hours.

item.title: Albanian judge shot dead in court by man on trial
item.description: Judge Astrit Kalaja was killed while two others were injured during a hearing at Tirana's Court of Appeal.

item.title: Macron should call early presidential vote, his first PM says
item.description: Ã‰douard Philippe's intervention comes a day after the French president's latest PM resigned just days into the role.

item.title: Jeremy Bowen: Two years on, will Israel and Hamas seize the chance to end the war?
item.description: There is a chance of a deal that will end the killing and destruction in Gaza and return the Israeli hostages, living and dead, to their families.
